faqs.title: Internet connection troubleshooting
faqs.content: If you're experiencing internet connectivity issues, try these troubleshooting steps to resolve common problems.
solution_steps: Check if other devices can connect to the internet
Restart your modem by unplugging for 30 seconds
Restart your router by unplugging for 30 seconds
Check all cable connections are secure
Run a speed test from speedtest.net
Try connecting via ethernet cable
Contact your ISP if issues persist
Check for local outages in your area

faqs.title: Software installation issues
faqs.content: If you're having trouble installing software, follow these steps to resolve common installation issues.
solution_steps: Check minimum system requirements
Ensure you have administrator privileges
Temporarily disable antivirus software
Clear temporary files and cache
Download the software again from official source
Run the installer as administrator
Try installing in compatibility mode
Restart your computer and try again
Contact software vendor if issues persist

faqs.title: Computer running slowly
faqs.content: If your computer is running slowly, these steps can help improve performance and speed.
solution_steps: Check available storage space (need at least 15% free)
Run disk cleanup to remove temporary files
Uninstall unused programs and applications
Disable startup programs you don't need
Run a full system antivirus scan
Update your operating system
Check for driver updates
Consider adding more RAM if consistently slow
Restart your computer regularly

faqs.title: Email not working or not receiving emails
faqs.content: Troubleshoot email issues including problems with sending, receiving, or accessing your email account.
solution_steps: Check your internet connection
Verify email server settings are correct
Check your spam/junk folder
Clear your email app cache
Try accessing email via web browser
Check if email account is over storage limit
Verify your email password is correct
Contact your email provider if issues persist
Check for email service outages

faqs.title: Device won't turn on or start up
faqs.content: If your device won't turn on or start up properly, try these troubleshooting steps.
solution_steps: Check that power cable is securely connected
Try a different power outlet
For laptops, ensure battery has charge
Press and hold power button for 10 seconds
Remove and reinsert battery if removable
Check for any visible damage to power components
Try starting in safe mode
If still not working, contact technical support
May need professional repair service
